sentences.sContent: Accusations of impropriety were made against the company’s directors.
sentences.sCn: 对公司董事不正当的行为提出了指控。

synos.tran: 不适当；不正确；用词错误；[审计]不正当行为

remMethod.val: im (不) + propriety (适当) → 不适当

words.tran: 不正确的，错误的；不适当的；不合礼仪的

trans.tranCn: 不适当；不正确；用词错误；[审计] 不正当行为
trans.tranOther: behaviour or an action that is wrong or unacceptable according to moral, social, or professional standards
